Keyguard Project

Mirrors artifacts available on https://github.com/AChep/keyguard-app/releases

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://gh.artemchep.com/keyguard-repo-fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
03 94 1C E7 9B 08 16 66 60 9C 8A 48 AB 6E 46 77 42 63 F6 FC 0B BF 1F A0 46 CC FF C6 0E A6 43 BC
